cause.description:
Compassionate Action for Animals works to reduce the suffering of farmed animals through outreach and education such as distributing leaflets, cable access shows, vegan food giveaways, and speakers. To build a community of people concerned about animal rights, we host vegetarian potlucks, dine-outs, and social events in Minneapolis and St. Paul.
If you make a donation, please consider being non-anonymous, so that we can thank you!
1. Animals deserve our respect and compassion.
2. Animals suffer terribly in moder animal agriculture
3. Vegan food tastes good and is healthy
cause.mission: To inspire respect for animals and promote vegetarianism through outreach, education, and community building.
cause.name: Compassionate Action for Animals
